name: sdk-chat
description: SDK Chat - Analyze SDKs, extract APIs, and generate production-quality code samples using AI
author: Microsoft

tools.name: detect_source
tools.description: Detect the source folder and programming language of an SDK. WHEN TO USE: First step to verify SDK is recognized. RETURNS: Source folder path, language, file extension, SDK name.

language.description: Force language: dotnet, python, java, javascript, typescript, go

tools.name: detect_samples
tools.description: Find existing samples/examples folder. WHEN TO USE: Before generating samples to avoid duplicates. RETURNS: Samples path, suggested path, all candidates.

packagePath.description: Absolute path to SDK root directory

tools.name: extract_api
tools.description: Extract complete public API surface from SDK. WHEN TO USE: To understand SDK operations or prepare context. RETURNS: Compact API signatures (70% smaller than source).

packagePath.description: Absolute path to SDK root directory

language.description: Force language: dotnet, python, java, javascript, typescript, go

format.description: 'stubs' for readable signatures, 'json' for structured data

tools.name: analyze_coverage
tools.description: Find which SDK operations have sample coverage and which are missing. WHEN TO USE: To identify documentation gaps. RETURNS: Coverage %, covered/uncovered operations.

packagePath.description: Absolute path to SDK root directory

samplesPath.description: Path to samples folder (auto-detected if omitted)

language.description: Force language: dotnet, python, java, javascript, typescript, go

tools.name: generate_samples
tools.description: Generate production-ready SDK samples using AI. WHEN TO USE: To create documentation examples. WORKFLOW: detect_source → analyze_coverage → generate_samples targeting gaps.

packagePath.description: Absolute path to SDK root directory

outputPath.description: Output directory (default: auto-detected samples/ or examples/)

budget.description: Max context chars (default: 512K). Reduce for faster generation.

language.description: Force language: dotnet, python, java, javascript, typescript, go
